## Split Data

```{r}
# Split data

df_split
```

```{r}
# Lihat data training
```

## Membuat alur pemrosesan data

```{r}
# Membuat Recipe
df_recipe <- training(df_split) %>%
  recipe(y ~.) %>%
  step_downsample(y) %>%
  prep()
df_recipe
```

```{r}
# Mererapkan ke data training 
df_training <- juice(df_recipe)
glimpse(df_training)
```
